HTML Table.description: Add snippet for a minimal HTML table with a header, body, and width classes defined

HTML thead tag.description: Add opening and closing <thead> tags for an HTML table

HTML tbody tag.description: Add opening and closing <tbody> tags for an HTML table

HTML tablerow tag.description: Add opening and closing <tr> tags for an HTML table with nested <td> elements

HTML tableheader tag.description: Add opening and closing <th> tags for an HTML table

HTML tabledata tag.description: Add opening and closing <td> tags for an HTML table

HTML bold tag.description: Add opening and closing <b> tags for bold text formatting in HTML

HTML italic tag.description: Add opening and closing <i> tags for italic text formatting in HTML

HTML underline tag.description: Add opening and closing <u> tags for underlined text formatting in HTML

HTML em-tags.description: Add opening and closing <em> tags for emphasized (italic) text formatting in HTML

HTML sub-tags.description: Add opening and closing <sub> tags for subscript text formatting in HTML

HTML sup-tags.description: Add opening and closing <sup> tags for superscript text formatting in HTML

HTML Header 1.description: Add opening and closing <h1> tags for heading text formatting in HTML

HTML Header 2.description: Add opening and closing <h2> tags for sub-heading text formatting in HTML

HTML a-tags.description: Add opening and closing <a> tags with href for hyperlink text formatting in HTML

HTML hr-tags.description: Add horizontal rule tag in HTML

HTML p-tags.description:
Add opening and closing

tags for paragraph text formatting in HTML

HTML class.description: Add class attribute to HTML elements

HTML width class.description: Add usr-width-* class to set element width

HTML align left class.description: Add usr-align-left class to align text left

HTML align center class.description: Add usr-align-center class to align text center

HTML align right class.description: Add usr-align-right class to align text right

HTML align justify class.description: Add usr-align-justify class to justify text

HTML vertical align top class.description: Add usr-valign-top class to vertically align content to top

HTML vertical align center class.description: Add usr-valign-center class to vertically align content to center

HTML vertical align bottom class.description: Add usr-valign-bottom class to vertically align content to bottom

HTML line top class.description: Add usr-line-top class to add a top border

HTML line bottom class.description: Add usr-line-bottom class to add a bottom border

HTML line left class.description: Add usr-line-left class to add a left border

HTML line right class.description: Add usr-line-right class to add a right border

HTML double line top class.description: Add usr-double-line-top class to add a double top border

HTML double line bottom class.description: Add usr-double-line-bottom class to add a double bottom border

HTML double line left class.description: Add usr-double-line-left class to add a double left border

HTML double line right class.description: Add usr-double-line-right class to add a double right border

HTML border colour class.description: Add class to set table cell border color in Hex

HTML background colour class.description: Add class to set table cell background color in Hex

HTML indent class.description: Add usr-indent-* class to indent content

HTML repeated header class.description: Add usr-repeated-header class to repeat table header on new pages in PDF export

HTML no left padding.description: Add usr-no-left-padding class to remove default left padding

HTML grayed-out background.description: Add class to set table cell background to gray

HTML grayed-out bottom line.description: Add class to set faint table cell bottom lines

HTML same page header.description: Add usr-hide-samepage-header class to hide header when content continues on same page
